sentences.english: Sensing food, a roach peers into a two-foot-tall pitcher plant.
sentences.chinese: 发现食物，一只蟑螂仔细观察着两英尺高的猪笼草。

sentences.english: The use of specific drugs on the cockroach fumigation devices, and fumigated .
sentences.chinese: 特定的药物对蟑螂熏蒸设备的使用，和熏蒸。

sentences.english: When I turned on the lights I discovered I'd coughed up a cockroach.
sentences.chinese: 我咳嗽着吐出来，打开灯一看，是一只蟑螂。

sentences.english: When threatened by a predator, hissing cockroaches make loud hisses .
sentences.chinese: 当蟑螂被肉食性动物威胁时，会发出更大的声响。

sentences.english: Learn the Cucaracha steps in rumba dancing in this free dance lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 学习伦巴舞的蟑螂在这个自由舞蹈课视频步骤。

sentences.english: GURNEE, Ill. - Why wait in line when you can just eat a cockroach?
sentences.chinese: 吃一只蟑螂就不用排队了，你还在等什么呢？

sentences.english: She was forced to live in a cockroach-infested house.
sentences.chinese: 她被迫住在一间蟑螂成群的房子里。

sentences.english: What about stepping on a cockroach?
Cockroaches skittered across the kitchen counter.
A cockroach can live  several weeks with its head cut off--it dies from starvation.
sentences.chinese: 蟑螂在被砍头之后还能活几个星期，最后死也是饿死。

sentences.english: That experience made me hate cockroaches.
sentences.chinese: 那次经历让我开始恨蟑螂。

sentences.english: The cockroach is the oldest extant winged insect, dating back more than 300 million years.
sentences.chinese: 蟑螂是现存最久的有翼昆虫，已有3亿年的历史了。

sentences.english: When it comes to roaches and mice you can try to go for control.
sentences.chinese: 对于蟑螂和老鼠，你可以尽力去控制。

sentences.english: They disinfested their house of cockroaches.
sentences.chinese: 他们杀灭他们房子里的蟑螂。

sentences.english: Days went by, and Howard saw fewer and fewer roaches.
sentences.chinese: 日子一天天过去，霍华德家的蟑螂越来越少。

sentences.english: Cockroaches are the insects that frighten me most.
sentences.chinese: 蟑螂是最让我害怕的昆虫。

definition: woodlouse (suborder Oniscidea within the order Isopoda)/a.k.a. roly-poly, pill bug, sow bug etc
